remarks: The degree of a composition of a monomial with a polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dgrcolem1.1 $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
dgrcolem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
dgrcolem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dgrcolem1.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
dgrcolem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( deg ` ( x e. CC |-> ( ( G ` x ) ^ M ) ) ) = ( M x. N ) ) $.
$d G x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
